text:
Chennai: Actor Suriya, on Sunday, took to Twitter and said that he has tested positive for covid-19. He added that he is undergoing treatment for the same in Chennai.

#ActorSuriya #Suriya #TamilActor #SouthActor #CovidPositive #Coronavirus #Covid19 #Vaccine #Chennai #MangoNews https://t.co/OZgnWTRwBp
